column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The work in the wing however is not all that great. I don't really get too interested in most contemporary art
column2: especially when it comes to photography. The best part of that wing is the design related pieces. Those really are nice
column3: and I have totally looked up and referenced some of the graphic and lighting designers that are exhibited. If you do like design
column4: you might think it's worth checking out.
